thread.title: ‘School’s out forever’: DeVos confirmed as education secretary; Cue wealthy celeb freakout!
thread.title_full: ‘School’s out forever’: DeVos confirmed as education secretary; Cue wealthy celeb freakout!

author: Sarah D.
title: ‘School’s out forever’: DeVos confirmed as education secretary; Cue wealthy celeb freakout!
text:
— Minnie Driver (@driverminnie) February 7, 2017 @seis_uno_seis @ArtPrize is there a list of devos family company's to boycott?? 
— Best Coast (@BestCoast) February 7, 2017 Beyond upsetting. Education took at serious hit today. @senafegop Pence cowered #Trump -didn't stand up for future of our kids! Shame. #devos https://t.co/pyaE9pMJxm 
— Rosie Perez (@rosieperezbklyn) February 7, 2017 What a soul-crushing morning. No words. #DeVos 
— Kristin Dos Santos (@KristinDSantos) February 7, 2017 @SenBobCorker are you really as dumb as your vote for DeVos? What's it like sucking on the teets of that sow hog named Trump. Pathetic. 
— Ralphie May (@Ralphie_May) February 7, 2017 JUST GOT OUT OF YOGA (v la ik) BUT BETSY DEVOS SERIOUSLY???? @mike_pence you just wronged the children of America. That's low 
— Emily Robinson (@Emily_Robinson) February 7, 2017 Betsy DeVos should have to go back through school Billy Madison-style. 
— Kyle Ayers (@kyleayers) February 7, 2017 Congradgulations to Betsy DeVos! Childrens need learning go give them learning Betsy 
— Patton Oswalt (@pattonoswalt) February 7, 2017 Betsy Devos got confirmed. Everyone who voted for her should be ashamed. Party before country. They're using children's education as pawns. 
— Kumail Nanjiani (@kumailn) February 7, 2017 CONFIRMED:A) Betsy DevosB) that there is no actual bottom to the pit of "unqualified" before anyone in the GOP grows integrity or balls. 
— Randi Mayem Singer (@rmayemsinger) February 7, 2017 At least we now know how much it costs to become Education Secretary. We got the receipts on the souls of every vote. #devos 
— Dave Zirin (@EdgeofSports) February 7, 2017 DeVos is my birth control. 
— Giulia Rozzi (@GiuliaRozzi) February 7, 2017 School's out forever. #DeVos 
— John Cohen (@JohnCohen1) February 7, 2017 I think I'm broken 
I never ran smooth but I think I'm really broken, I'm sorry, I was funny for a while, good times, please keep fighting 
— Joss Whedon (@joss) February 7, 2017 Trending 'School's out forever': DeVos confirmed as education secretary; Cue wealthy celeb freakout! 
Oh, the humanity! "war on children", "radical", "no more public schools"– GTFOOH with that nonsense if you want people to take you seriously.
